Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at Kedzie.

Shuttle buses are available from Forest Park to UIC- Halsted to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
